text: haey( chaur anak changcham ampi rueng) hsaa n noun( you nou sa)now pel delke chakchenh tow daoy kamhoeng haey ke ban kitthea yeung ( a l laoh) min thveutondakamm leu roubke te kraoyomk ke ban buong suong som knong pel ngngut tha pitabrakd nasa kmean mcheasa na phe sang del trauv korp sakkar pitabrakd krawpi trong laey . trong mha saatasam. pitabrakd nasa khnhom te del sthet knongchamnaom anak del bampean noh
